course_description: This course focuses on the physiology and pathology of the hematologic, pulmonary, renal, and hepatic systems with emphasis related to management during CPB (Cardiopulmonary bypass) and life sustaining supports.
prerequisites: CVP 566 prerequisite and  CVP 583 co-requisite or equivalent transfer credit. Students must enroll in CVP 583 first.
